# Ghostty Catppuccin Mocha Theme
# Based on: https://github.com/catppuccin/ghostty/blob/main/catppuccin/mocha.yaml

colors:
  # Basic colors
  foreground: "#CDD6F4"
  background: "#000000"
  selection:
    foreground: "#1E1E2E"
    background: "#F5E0DC"
  
  # Cursor
  cursor:
    color: "#F5E0DC"
    text-color: "#1E1E2E"
  
  # URL colors
  url:
    color: "#F5E0DC"
  
  # Terminal colors
  black:   "#45475A"
  red:     "#F38BA8"
  green:   "#A6E3A1"
  yellow:  "#F9E2AF"
  blue:    "#89B4FA"
  magenta: "#F5C2E7"
  cyan:    "#94E2D5"
  white:   "#BAC2DE"
  
  bright:
    black:   "#585B70"
    red:     "#F38BA8"
    green:   "#A6E3A1"
    yellow:  "#F9E2AF"
    blue:    "#89B4FA"
    magenta: "#F5C2E7"
    cyan:    "#94E2D5"
    white:   "#A6ADC8"

font:
  family: "FiraCode Nerd Font"
  style:
    regular: "SemBd"
    italic: "Retina"
  size: 18.0
  features: "+zero +onum"

window:
  decorations: false
  opacity: 0.5
  
  # Ghostty uses macOS/OS theme for titlebar by default
  # No direct equivalent for wayland/macos_titlebar_color
  
cursor:
  hide-when-typing: true  # Similar to mouse_hide_wait
  trail:
    length: 10
    decay: 0.5

selection:
  copy-on-select: true

tabs:
  style: powerline
  position: top
  
  # Tab colors
  active:
    foreground: "#11111B"
    background: "#A28ABD"
  inactive:
    foreground: "#6e6a86"
    background: "#26233a"
  
  # Tab bar background
  background: "#11111B"
  
  # Powerline style - Ghostty uses "slanted" or "rounded"
  # For rounded powerline (similar to kitty's round):
  powerline-style: rounded
  
  # Tab title formatting
  title-format: "{title}"

bell:
  # Visual bell border color (not directly supported in Ghostty)
  # Ghostty has visual bell but not border color customization
  visual: true

# Additional Ghostty-specific settings
scrollback:
  lines: 10000

shell:
  program: /bin/zsh  # or your preferred shell

# Ghostty doesn't have mark colors or bell_border_color
# Ghostty uses system colors for window borders by default

# The basic colors

font_family FiraCode Nerd Font SemBd
italic_font      FiraCode Nerd Font Retina

font_size 18.0

font_features FiraCode-SemBd +zero +onum

mouse_hide_wait -1.0

copy_on_select yes

cursor_trail 10
cursor_trail_start_threshold 0 
cursor_trail_decay 0.1 0.5

hide_window_decorations yes

tab_bar_style powerline
tab_powerline_style round
tab_bar_edge top
tab_bar_margin_width 0
tab_bar_margin_height 0.0

# Customize the powerline symbol
tab_title_template " {title} "

# Tab bar colors
active_tab_foreground   #11111B
active_tab_background   #A28ABD
inactive_tab_foreground  #6e6a86
inactive_tab_background  #26233a
tab_bar_background       #191724
tab_bar_background      #11111B

background_opacity 0.5
